short_summary: Services of One (1) Environmental Consultant for Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) 2
description: one (1) Environmental Consultant to support Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) 2 located in the National Capital Region
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Environmental Consultant**
#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-23-SC02
* **Publication Date:** October 19, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 18, 2022, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Requirement Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) Environmental Consultant to support Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) 2. The successful candidate will provide environmental consulting services for a period of two years, with three (3) irrevocable option years. The estimated level of effort for this contract is 240 days per year.

#### Key Requirements

* **Location:** National Capital Region, specific location: 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC
* **Security Clearance:** Secret security clearance is required for the supplier and resources
* **Estimated Timeframe:** December 1, 2022 to November 30, 2024, with three (3) irrevocable option years

#### Special Instructions

* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* **Enquiries:** All enquiries must be submitted by email to the DND POC no later than five (5) calendar days before the bid closing date

#### Further Information

* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to bidders who have signed agreements with the Government of Canada, including the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others.
* **Contact Information:** For further information, please contact Sharon Sally, DND POC, at [sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca](mailto:sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca) or 819-939-8990.

#### Attachments

* RFP Amendment 1: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/26/01f635e861bfcd4494ac1a07b7c54f07/w8485-23-sc02_rfp_amendment_1.pdf>
* RFP Amendment 2: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/42264d1515810c198638b1db04dedf21/w8485-23-sc02_r
